page.title: 16SUPERNATURAL
page.content: At the{Laurals,}Kislingbury people have reported hearing strange and weird noises.In the eighteenth century,an old man stole some jewels to support his wife and children.He was caught in the act of hiding them, and was stabbed many times in the back.Shortly after, the {Laurals}was built on the exact spot where he died. In the sixteenth century,{Quinton {House}was a fine majestic hall.In the hall,there lived a beautiful woman.She had many suitors and made many people jealous and unhappy.On Saint Valentines night at 11.30 pm,one of her many suitors crept up to her room. There was a scuffle and the woman fell to her death.Every Valentines day at 11.30 pm a pitiful screaming is heard.
